whatIs.title: What is an Event Coach?
whatIs.description1: An Event Coach is an experienced event professional who provides guidance, support, and expertise throughout your event planning process. They work alongside you to ensure your event is successful, while taking care of the details that might otherwise overwhelm you.
whatIs.description2: Whether you need help with a specific aspect of your event or want someone to manage the entire process, our Event Coaches are here to help. They bring years of experience and industry knowledge to make your event planning process smoother and more efficient.

step1.title: Book a Consultation
step1.description: Schedule a free consultation with one of our Event Coaches. Discuss your event needs, goals, and challenges to determine how we can best support you.

step2.title: Create a Plan
step2.description: Together with your Event Coach, create a customized plan that outlines the scope of work, timeline, and estimated hours needed for your event.

step3.title: Execute with Confidence
step3.description: Your Event Coach works with you throughout the planning process, providing guidance, handling tasks, and ensuring everything runs smoothly.
